shortdesc.ph: Reasons for a user being offline.

pd.p: 1: The SDK times out and the user drops offline because no data packet is received within a certain period of time.
pd.note: If the user quits the call and the message is not passed to the SDK (due to an unreliable channel), the SDK assumes the user dropped offline.

plentry.pd: 2: The user switches the client role from the host to the audience.
